title: Week 10: Quakin' in my boots

links.label: Local Quakes (Team Project)
links.info: Shakin' it up with the Geolocation API.

links.label: Router.js
links.info: A home-made router, just for fun.

questions: What makes a good router? If I can't bookmark my position in the app, or scrape information from the URL, then is it really doing its job?
In the spirit of doing everything from scratch, I wrote !!LINK 1 a little router!! that can use regular expressions with named capture groups to pass information to the view.
Seattle is baking today! ☀️☀️☀️ High of 101 degrees... Too hot!
